Class DatabaseSearcher

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • fetchStringsWhere

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> fetchStringsWhere(java.lang.String table,
                                                          java.lang.String checkColumn,
                                                          java.lang.String hasValue,
                                                          java.lang.String retrieveColumn)
                                                   throws org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                                                          NoRecordFoundException
        Retrieves list of strings from database where a column equals value
        Parameters:
        table - database table
        checkColumn - column to compare to value
        hasValue - value column must have to retrieve
        retrieveColumn - the column to retrieve when checkColumn has hasValue
        Returns:
        List of strings from retrieveColumn where checkColumn has hasValue
        Throws:
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error
        NoRecordFoundException - thrown if no matching records are found

      • addJoinRecords

        public void addJoinRecords(java.lang.String table,
                           java.lang.String firstColumn,
                           java.lang.String secondColumn,
                           int[] firstID,
                           int[] secondID)
                    throws org.sql2o.Sql2oException,
                           InvalidDatabaseOperation
        Adds records to join table
        Parameters:
        table - the table to add the records to
        firstColumn - the name of the first column of the join table
        secondColumn - the name of the second column of the join table
        firstID - array of ids to be inserted into the first column
        secondID - array of ids to be inserted into the second column
        Throws:
        InvalidDatabaseOperation - thrown if lengths of id arrays are not the same
        org.sql2o.Sql2oException - thrown if database error

        secondColumn - second column's name
        firstID - id for first column
        secondID - id for second column
        Throws:
